Package uk.mqchinee.archelia.utils

Class RunUtils

java.lang.Object
uk.mqchinee.archelia.utils.RunUtils
public class RunUtils extends Object
Utility class for managing scheduled tasks in Bukkit.

    • runLater

      public static void runLater(Runnable r, int wait, Time type)
      Run a task later with a specified delay.
      Parameters:
      r - The Runnable task to run later.
      wait - The delay in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      type - The Time type indicating whether the delay is in ticks or seconds.

    • repeating

      public static int repeating(Runnable r, int delay, int period, Time type)
      Run a task with a specified delay and period, creating a repeating timer.
      Parameters:
      r - The Runnable task to run with a repeating timer.
      delay - The initial delay before the first execution in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      period - The delay between consecutive executions in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      type - The Time type indicating whether the delays are in ticks or seconds.
      Returns:
      The task ID of the repeating timer.

    • repeatingAsync

      public static int repeatingAsync(Runnable r, int delay, int period, Time type)
      Run a task with a specified delay and period asynchronously, creating a repeating timer.
      Parameters:
      r - The Runnable task to run with a repeating timer.
      delay - The initial delay before the first execution in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      period - The delay between consecutive executions in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      type - The Time type indicating whether the delays are in ticks or seconds.
      Returns:
      The task ID of the repeating timer.

    • runLaterAsync

      public static void runLaterAsync(Runnable r, int wait, Time type)
      Run a task later asynchronously with a specified delay.
      Parameters:
      r - The Runnable task to run later.
      wait - The delay in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      type - The Time type indicating whether the delay is in ticks or seconds.

    • runTimerAsync

      public static int runTimerAsync(Runnable r, int delay, int period, Time type)
      Run a task with a specified delay and period asynchronously, creating a repeating timer.
      Parameters:
      r - The Runnable task to run with a repeating timer.
      delay - The initial delay before the first execution in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      period - The delay between consecutive executions in ticks or seconds, based on the Time type.
      type - The Time type indicating whether the delays are in ticks or seconds.
      Returns:
      The task ID of the repeating timer.
